title.rendered: “There will be about 2 million jobs created in India due to booming internet penetration” – Manu Jolly

content.rendered:
“There will be about 2 million jobs created in India due to booming internet penetration”

The prominent publication – Business Economics – has featured Digiperform in its magazine edition under Technology section, in the May issue by the Journalist Varsha Singh.

   

The publication highlighted Digiperform in the cover story under the headline – “There will be about 2 million jobs created in India due to booming internet penetration”, in an open discussion with Manu Jolly, Co-Founder of Digiperform, sharing its business model, expansion plans, clientele and traction Digital Marketing is receiving in India.

Coverage Details:

Publication– Business Economics

Headline – “There will be about 2 million jobs created in India due to booming internet penetration”- Manu Jolly

Issue– May 2018

Page– 44

Edition– Print and Online

Link– https://businesseconomics.in/%E2%80%9Cthere-will-be-about-2-million-jobs-created-india-due-booming-internet-penetration%E2%80%9D-manu-jolly

excerpt.rendered: The prominent publication – Business Economics – has featured Digiperform in its magazine edition under Technology section, in the May issue by the Journalist Varsha Singh.
